Hi I'm a Concerned campaigner about climate & against the idiots running/destroying the world!
I'm also a Wine & chilli fan been growing them in the UK (yes both!) since 1974, also an engineer & IT systems eng
An early adopter & evangelist of the internet having one of the first email addresses in East London, live Domain and on my own server ON a (now rare?) owned IP in 1993/4 been running mail, data & web stuff for clients ever since!
